creditline: Gift of funds from Ellen Wells
description: unsigned; two ladies wearing brightly-patterned dresses seated at a table in foreground; woman at right wears black dress with blue and brown leaf pattern and red hat with white feather and flowers and green and gold feathered fan; woman at left wears peach and yellow dress with white, yellow and blue flowers; red flowered garment on back of same woman's chair; four dancing couples in center middle ground
marks: at left edge, ULQ, in brown: [1924 (vertical)]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Dancing at the New Carlton Café in Shanghai
